greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Dirichlet convolution of Moebius function mu(n) (A008683) with Ternary numbers A001764.
formula: G.f. A(x) satisfies: Sum_{n>=1} A((x - 2*x^2 + x^3)^n) = x - x^2.
program: (PARI) /* Dirichlet convolution of mu(n) with Ternary numbers A001764: */
{a(n)=local(A=[1, 0]); for(i=1, n, A=concat(A, 0); A[#A]=-Vec(sum(n=1, #A, subst(x*Ser(A), x, (x-2*x^2+x^3 +x*O(x^#A))^n)))[#A]); A[n]}
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jan 04 2015
